Translations.title: Famous Swedish
Translations.headerText: Discovering Sweden's Contributions to the World from the
Translations.categorySubtitle: As if destined to change the world.
Translations.aboutPage: Swedish Inventions celebrates Sweden's amazing contributions to the world, from everyday things like the three-point seatbelt to groundbreaking technologies and popular brands. We want to show how Swedish ideas have shaped modern life, often without us even realizing it. The website tells the stories of these inventions and the people behind them, making learning fun and easy. We believe it's important to recognize Sweden's impact on technology, design, and culture, and we're always adding more. In the future, we will also be showcasing top Swedish artists, footballers, athletes, musicians, films, and music, along with other areas where Sweden excels, like literature, architecture, and sustainable solutions. We want to be the go-to place for discovering everything Sweden is famous for. Contact us if you have questions, suggestions, or want to contribute!
Translations.contact-one: Feel free to drop us an email anytime.
Translations.contact-two: We would love to hear from you.
Translations.timelineSubtitle: Explore Swedish innovations through the years
Translations.timelineDescription: Sweden has a rich history of innovation spanning over centuries. Our interactive timeline showcases key Swedish inventions that have changed the world, from the Celsius temperature scale in 1742 to modern digital innovations like Spotify and Minecraft. Explore these groundbreaking contributions chronologically and discover the stories behind each invention.
Translations.timelinePromoSubtitle: From 1742 to today: See how Swedish inventions shaped the world
Translations.selectInvention: Select an invention to learn more
Translations.noInventionsInCentury: No inventions found in this century

quiz.title: Swedish Inventions Quiz
quiz.intro: Test your knowledge about famous Swedish inventions and innovations!
quiz.description: How well do you know Sweden's innovative history? Test your knowledge about famous Swedish inventions and innovations with our interactive quiz. Challenge yourself, learn interesting facts, and share your results with friends!
quiz.perfect: Congratulations! You're a Swedish invention expert!
quiz.great: Great job! You know a lot about Swedish inventions!
quiz.good: Good try! There's more to learn about Sweden's amazing innovations.
quiz.shareText: I scored {score} out of {total} on the Swedish Inventions Quiz! Test your knowledge too!
quiz.takeChallengeMessage: Challenge your friends to beat your score!
quiz.promoText: Did you know Sweden has invented some of the world's most important innovations? Take our quiz to discover how much you know about Swedish creativity!
